verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:9
verses.text: There went up a smoke out of his nostrils, and fire out of his mouth devoured: coals were kindled by it.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:10
verses.text: He bowed the heavens also, and came down; and darkness was under his feet.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:11
verses.text: And he rode upon a cherub, and did fly: and he was seen upon the wings of the wind.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:12
verses.text: And he made darkness pavilions round about him, dark waters, and thick clouds of the skies.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:13
verses.text: Through the brightness before him were coals of fire kindled.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:14
verses.text: The Lord thundered from heaven, and the most High uttered his voice.
